Interface PseudoQueryScorer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimplePseudoQueryScorer

    public interface PseudoQueryScorer
    Computes a quality score for a pseudo query.
    Author:
    Nima Asadi

      float getScore(String query, PseudoJudgments judgments)
